Allentown.Parkland High School (Pennsylvania): Parkland High School is a public high school located in Meyersville, Pennsylvania, approximately 5 miles northwest of downtown Allentown. The school serves students in grades 9-12 and is the only high school for the Parkland School District. With 3,215 students in the 2017-2018 school year, Parkland is the largest high school in the Lehigh Valley.
